p: To assess the robustness of our results we ran 8 additional regression analyses by implementing a series of changes to the analysis. These changes included the following: setting the daily air travel volume to 0.1, 1, or 6 passengers/day for locations not listed by Lai et al. (unpub. data, https://doi.org/10.1101/2020.02.04.20020479) ( Figure 2, panels Aâ€“C); removing all locations not listed by Lai et al. before fitting ( Figure 2, panel D); defining high surveillance locations by using a more lenient GHS Index criterion, 50th quantile ( Figure 2, panel E), and a more stringent criterion, 95th quantile ( Figure 2, panel F); excluding Thailand from the model because it is a high-leverage point ( Figure 2, panel G); and using an overdispersed Poisson likelihood (i.e., a negative-binomial likelihood) ( Figure 2, panel H). We provide code for these analyses on GitHub ( https://github.com/c2-d2/cov19flightimport).
